name: MadMoneyCramerRemix
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Mad Money Cramer Remix brings you insights shared on CNBC's hit show, Mad Money with Jim Cramer.
Add Mad Money Cramer Remix to your Flash Briefing and move it to the top of your news by going to Settings in the Alexa app. You can manage your Flash Briefing under Account.
After adding Mad Money Cramer Remix, you can say “Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing?” or “Alexa, what’s in the news?” to hear the latest.
Don't forget to check out all of CNBC's Flash Briefings on Alexa, including CNBC Tech Check, CNBC Markets Now, and more. Just search for "CNBC" in the Alexa Skill Store.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
